java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ListCellRenderer, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class BibleNameCellRenderer
extends javax.swing.DefaultListCellRenderer

Render a list of Bible Book names with their full name as a tooltip

作者：
DM Smith [dmsmith555 at yahoo dot com]

for license details.

public BibleNameCellRenderer()
Constructs a default renderer object for an item in a list, using full names.

BibleNameCellRenderer

public BibleNameCellRenderer(boolean abbreviated)
Constructs a renderer object for an item in a list, using abbreviated names if desired.

参数：
abbreviated - use the initials in the list.
